Name: Village Guardians
About the game: 「Village Guardians」 is a VR action game in which you switch weapons depending on the situation and your preference. Robots keep coming out from the base, so you have to destroy them while attacking and dodging them. You are free to destroy objects in the stage to advance, or use them to stop them. Choose your favorite weapon from pistol, machine gun, sword, and hammer to attack the attacking robots. You can block the robot's attacks with the shield in your left hand.
